TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseDataEnvironment : IDisposable, msdatasrc.DataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract BaseDataEnvironment extends System.Object implements class msdatasrc.DataSource, class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataEnvironment Implements DataSource, IDisposable
public ref class BaseDataEnvironment abstract : IDisposable, msdatasrc::DataSource
type BaseDataEnvironment = class interface DataSource interface IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Emula un de Visual Basic 6.0 en las aplicaciones actualizadas de Visual Basic 6.0.

span.span: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En Visual Basic 6.0, los formularios enlazados a datos fueron creados automáticamente cuando arrastra los elementos de la base de datos de un `Data Environment` a un formulario.In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form. El `Data Environment` controla todas las asignaciones entre Visual Basic 6.0 y la capa de datos de ADO.The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer. Cuando se actualiza una aplicación a Visual Basic, un `BaseDataEnvironment` se crea para permitir el código relacionado con ADO.When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por un objeto y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por un objeto .

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se llama por el público `Dispose()` método y el método.This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: Es para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por un objeto y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se llama por el público `Dispose()` método y el método.This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el parámetro de eliminación establecido en `true`.`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. invoca `Dispose` con el parámetro de eliminación establecido en `false`. invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. Cuando el parámetro de eliminación es `true`, este método libera todos los recursos mantenidos por los objetos administrados que hace referencia este control.When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. Este método invoca al método `Dispose()` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
